function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Influx of Chinese tourists during Chinese New Year","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease spread due to high volume of travellers","Mitigation":"Implement strict screening measures and travel advisories for high-risk regions","Technologies":"Temperature screening, travel advisories, quarantine protocols","People":"Travellers, local residents, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, healthcare authorities"},{"Description":"Confirmed cases of coronavirus in Singapore","Impact":"Risk of community transmission and heightened anxiety among residents","Mitigation":"Enforce strict quarantine measures, travel advisories, and public health education","Technologies":"Isolation protocols, travel advisories, public health campaigns","People":"Patients, local residents, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, healthcare authorities"},{"Description":"Panic buying of surgical masks and medical supplies","Impact":"Shortage of essential medical supplies and potential price gouging","Mitigation":"Ensure availability of supplies, limit purchase quantities, and regulate prices","Technologies":"Supply chain management, price regulation, public communication","People":"Customers, retailers, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, retailers"}]}
